none.$description: Border radius of zero - hard corners.

small.$description: Smaller than standard border radius for nested, rounded corners or more subtly rounded corners.

standard.$description: Standard (default) border radius for cards, surfaces or components.

full.$description: Maximum border radius, for fully rounded or otherwise large cards, surfaces or components.

none.$description: Stroke width of zero - no visible border.

fine.$description: Fine stroke width for small elements or contexts where a border is not needed to be prominent.

thin.$description: Default stroke width for cards, dividers, utility buttons and other custom applications.

medium.$description: Medium stroke width for cards, dividers and other custom applications.

thick.$description: Thick stroke width for cards, dividers, navigation, inputs and other custom applications.
